metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0049 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
OpenTTD before 1.1.5 contains a Denial of Service (slow read attack) thatprevents users from joining the server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0049` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openttd - 1.2.0-1
openttd-data - 1.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openttd package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1').
